department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: National Master Standing Offers for marine fuels.
description: The Amendment directs potential bidders to disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time.
full_summary:
### E60HL-230051-F Marine Fuel NMSO 2023-2025
**Reference Number:** WS3915620080-DOC4489471227  
**Second Amendment Date:** 2024-03-22  
**Bid Closing Date and Time:** 2024-03-25T14:00:00  
**Original Tender Closing Date and Time:** Revised to 14:00 (2:00 PM) EDT on March 25, 2024  
**Original Tender Announcement Date:** 2024-03-14  
**Expected Contract Start and End Dates:** 2023-06-01 and 2025-05-31, respectively  
**Standards and Delivery Locations:** This Standing Offer for marine fuels covers the delivery to various locations in Canada, including comprehensive land claims settlement areas, in accordance with Canadian General Standards Board standards (Appendix A).

**Notice Type:** Competitive Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)  
**Procurement Category:** Goods (GD)  
**Trade Agreements:** Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), and Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement.

### Requested Goods:
National Master Standing Offers for marine fuels in accordance with Canadian General Standards Board standards (Appendix A). The delivery to various locations in Canada as required during the period of date of issuance of standing offer up to and including May 31, 2025, is required.

### Contact Information:
* Company Name: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)  
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5  
* Point of Contact: MacLeod, Bobbi (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [bobbi.macleod@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:bobbi.macleod@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Access to the Tender:
To access this R
